STBLKeyStringList.Text: (From pretending to be a monster)
{0.SimFirstName} is doing something unprofessional! Continue behaving poorly on the job will result in {0.SimFirstName} being fired from the gig.
One of {0.SimFirstName}’s previous clients referred someone new to {M0.him}{F0.her}! That bodes well for {M0.his}{F0.her} professional reputation!
{0.SimFirstName} has been offered a gig from a previous client. This could be {M0.his}{F0.her} chance to make it up to an otherwise unhappy customer.
{0.SimFirstName} has been offered a gig from a previous client. Returning customers bode well for {M0.his}{F0.her} professional reputation!
(From Renovating Current Location)
No such thing as bad publicity, right? {0.SimFirstName}'s work is going to be on Failures ‘N’ Flops! Tune in and watch on the Dream Home Decorator Network, Friday 8:00-10:00 PM.

Who cares if {M0.he}{F0.she} doesn't remember signing a release form, {0.SimFirstName}'s work is going to be on an episode of Ace of Space!\nTune in and watch on the Dream Home Decorator Network, Friday 8:00-10:00 PM.
(From Completing a Commercial Interior Decorator Gig)
(From Completing a Residential Interior Decorator Gig)
Hello! I'm here on behalf of {0.String}. Just ask me what you want to know.
Uh, did you really just quit in the middle of a job? Rude!
I'll head out now so you can get started. See you later!
A new Memory Card has been added to {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory. Use it to manage the photos that were taken during an Interior Decorator Gig.
Taking Before and After Photos to document your work as an Interior Decorator is important. Learn how to take control and get that perfect shot in the Taking Photos Lesson under Dream Home Decorator.
I'm ready to wrap this up!
This was a lot to take in! I'm ready to talk about the changes.
I think I've seen enough. Let's go over my thoughts!
I'm ready to talk about the renovation.

A picture is worth a thousand words. Not all of these words were good, though. {0.SimFirstName}'s professional reputation took a small hit, but {M0.he}{F0.she} still gained {1.Number} Followers. {0.SimFirstName} now has {2.Number} total Followers.

Ouch, the photo wasn't well received. That hurt {0.SimFirstName}'s professional reputation a little, but at least {M0.he}{F0.she} still gained {1.Number} Followers. {0.SimFirstName} now has {2.Number} Followers in total.

Beautiful! This photo has inspired others. {0.SimFirstName}'s professional reputation increased a little, and {M0.he}{F0.she} gained {1.Number} Followers. {0.SimFirstName} now has {2.Number} total Followers.
Woah, that one might go viral! {0.SimFirstName}'s professional reputation increased a little, and {M0.he}{F0.she} gained {1.Number} Followers. {0.SimFirstName} now has {2.Number} total Followers.

Go Gnome or go home. Or rather, more Gnomes in more homes. As the official Ambassador of The Association of Gnomes are The Greatest, we'd like to encourage you to start placing more Gnomes in the lawns, gardens, nurseries, kitchens, bathrooms, and basements of your Clients' homes. Here, we'll get you started with this. Don't let us down.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

We're going to be honest with you, your clients could find better refrigerators than the Crisponix line. That said, we could definitely use some good press. If we give you one for free would you consider using a Crisponix refrigerator in one of your next kitchen remodels?

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

InvisiView. Why subject your clients to normal TVs when you could be revamping their space with a TV that actually improves their eyesight? Please accept this token of our gratitude with the understanding that you will most certainly be using it in one of your next interior decoration gigs.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

{0.SimFirstName}, this is your lucky day. Hi, I'm Kip from Reclamation Homeware and we'd love to encourage you to start using our classic furnishings as one of your go-to brands when you're working with Clients. As a token of our future gratitude for your support, we'd like to offer you a small gift.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Hello, Friend. I am stunned by the beauty your decorated spaces emit. I am Edgar, an avid collector of relics that once belonged to the most breathtaking Princess Cordelia. However, as I grow older and weaker by the day, I fear that if her furnishings aren't passed down her memory may be forgotten... forever. Could you please, please keep my precious Cordelia alive by adorning the homes of future clients with these priceless furnishings? It's growing so dark. So cold. Please accept this heirloom as my last... dying... ggggwwwwwggggggggghhhhhhhhn {2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Your decoration skills have earned you quite the reputation. Some might say that you're the whole package. You've got it all; vision, style, creativity. But you're missing one thing: Countryside Caress furnishings will elevate your interiors to a whole new level. Are you ready to start... today?

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Hello, Beautiful. You don't know me, but I've been admiring your Interior Decoration work from afar for quite some time. I think your flawless, brilliant hands would be the perfect vessel to help inspire a revived appreciation of the arts. Please accept a prized piece from my own private collection to use in any of your upcoming decoration gigs.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Hi, {0.SimFirstName}! I'm Sally, a representative from Kindermade Enterprises. We think your aesthetic is the perfect pairing for the Kindermade brand. We'd love you to consider using some of our playful furnishings in your future decoration jobs. Please accept this gift as a thank you for considering us in future collaborations.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Be classy, be spontaneous, be flexible. Be all the Be's with new Be Modular shelving. Would you make sure to spread the joy of our new flexible Be Modular shelving line to all of your clients by featuring our timeless functional pieces in your Decoration Gigs? Here's a taste to get you started. {2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

MegaMission Furniture Warehouse is on a mission: to convince YOU to feature our sturdy, classic handcrafted furniture in your next decoration job. We'd like to start you off with a free sample from our workshop. Enjoy. And remember: never stop decorating with Mega.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

Here at PostRustic, we believe every kitchen and every bathroom needs a piece of PostRustic flair. We've understood this logic for a long time now, and we've been patiently waiting for the rest of the world to come to that conclusion as well. Would you be able to help PostRustic speed up that realization and start featuring our fine kitchen and bathroom décor items in your Interior Decoration jobs? Allow us to gift you a piece for free to get you started.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.

A happy kitchen is a Schmapple kitchen. Schmapple Headquarters would like to see our line of sexy, revolutionary kitchen appliances in the homes of your clients. They deserve no less than the Schmapple dream. Please consider our offer and accept this token of our appreciation. Schmapple Schmapple.

{2.String} can be found in the Household Inventory.
Socialize with Clients
Increases Work Performance. Increases Social Need.
Who'd want to work with them anyways!
It takes a keen eye to design the interior for a place of business.
Business Savvy Décor
It's very awkward to be back here. {0.SimFirstName} gets the sense that folks are still feeling sour about that job.
Hostile Atmosphere
It feels good to visit the site of a successful job! {0.SimFirstName} feels like others recognize {M0.his}{F0.her} good work.
Feeling Welcomed
Any publicity is good publicity... right?
Failures 'N' Flops
Feels good to be recognized for a job well done!
Ace of Space
Take a gig, complete a gig, take another gig... getting giggy with it!
Giggity Gig
Reading the Room
Unable to get a good read on the Clients.
Getting the feeling the job might not be to the Client's satisfaction.
Happy Clients hopefully means a job well done!
The Clients clearly love the new space!
The Client is waiting for the Design to be Revealed!
Fee Fi Fo Fum! I will get you, little children!
I'm a Monster
Eek! A Monster!
Scared by Monster
A world of pure imagination!
Living in My Own World
(From Scratched Tent)
This tent is all scratched up. That's very sad.
Shabby Tent
I see what they were trying to do. I know that I can do that!
A Home Decorating Show!
That was an interesting home makeover. I'll bet I can do even better!
I never considered that room arrangement. I have so many new ideas I want to try now!
What a beautiful room. I want to try it!
Remembering an interior decorating job done so well back at home.
Home Improvement
Just the sight of someone can fill a Sim with rage! {0.SimFirstName}'s fury surges back to the surface when {M0.he}{F0.she} is reminded of the terrible decoration job that was done wrong.
Tear it Down!
It's HIDEOUS!
Revolting! Get it away! {0.SimFirstName} hates Basic Décor!
Revolting! Get it away! {0.SimFirstName} hates Boho Décor!

Clients will allot a certain budget to use for the renovations. If you go over budget, the amount will turn red. Going over budget will negatively affect your performance and reputation.

{0.SimFirstName} earned {4.Money} but {0.SimFirstName} clients don't appear satisfied with the new look {5.String}
{0.SimFirstName} brought home {4.Money} today. {M0.He}{F0.She} did some superb Decorating too! {5.String}
{0.SimFirstName} earned {4.Money} but it appears the clients were not very happy with {0.SimFirstName}'s decorating work. {5.String}
{0.SimFirstName} brought home {4.Money} today. {M0.He}{F0.She} did some great Decorating, too! {5.String}
What a day of Decorating! {0.SimFirstName} is back home and {M0.he}{F0.she} has earned {4.Money}!
{0.SimFirstName} has a Decorator Gig in one hour. Get to the Client's Lot on time to chat with them about what they are looking for before starting renovations!
It's time for {0.SimFirstName} to head to the Client's lot. Getting there on time can be a good opportunity to get to know the Client's Likes and Dislikes. Ready to head over?
Time to Design!
Send Alone
Lets Go To Work!
{0.SimFirstName} is now {1.String|enAn} at {3.String}. {M0.He}{F0.She} can use the Career Panel to search for clients looking for spaces to be redecorated!

{0.SimFirstName} has been promoted to {1.String}!

{8.String}

house

{0.SimFirstName} has completed the gig and has received the following results!
Results!
Stay On Lot
Go Home

{0.SimFirstName} put some effort into decorating the space, but the Client didn't seem too impressed. Was it lack of vision? Artistry? Spacial awareness? Maybe another Gig will help make things right.
Well… that went nicely! The Clients seem to really like the new layout! The keen eye for detail seemed to really pay off, both in Simoleons and Reputation.
The Clients are shocked! They are incredibly saddened... even at a loss for words upon receiving your Resignation.
Nice work! The clients seem to enjoy the newly renovated space!
There's no accounting for taste. But then, maybe it's just the Client's taste and yours don't match...
Professional Reputation Dropped
Professional Reputation Improved Significantly
Professional Reputation Improved
Professional Reputation Dropped Significantly

<font color="#0949AB">Client Name:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.String}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Lot Type:</font><font color="#10A317"> {1.String}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Starts:</font> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort} <font color="#0949AB">Ends:</font> {3.DayOfWeekShort} {3.TimeShort}
Really interested in adding a new level to our house here, but a little undecided on what it should be exactly... can you help us out? We will let you decide the whole layout for the new level.
Level Addition
Celebrity Home Level Addition
Can you please come and invigorate some style to my boring abode? The Simoleons are not a problem, just bring some life into this place! Some pizazz! Change makes me feel ALIVE!
Okay, emergency renovation here! I just found out I might get featured on Ace of Space on the Dream Home Decorator Network! Can you renovate a room in my place? It would pump up my rep for sure!
Up and Comer Client Room Renovation

So, we've come into a little bit of money, and we were thinking we could really create more space in the house. Can you add a level? We'll pay really well! And you can make anything your heart desires! We just want the space!
Add a Level to this Home

So look. I need some "me" time. A place I can just unwind, have some juice, and maybe watch TV or play some games. Maybe display some cool stuff... my "trophies" if you will. But basically, I don't want to be distracted by the outside world! Can you make me my own den cave, where only numero uno can enter - me!
A Level for Him Addition

It's so hard to focus these days. What, with everything that's going on. I need a space where I can sit back, and work on my crafts, or read, or sip a glass of juice. Is that too much to ask? Make me my little corner of my domain, and I'll forever be grateful!
A Level for Her Addition
Basement Gym Level Addition

So, lately we've been working from home. A lot. I mean, like, we're always here, and I gotta tell you, I'm putting on some of the ol' "L-B's", you know what I'm saying? I need to shed some love handles! I'd go to the gym but... it's sooo faaaar! Turns out, there's this whole space utilized under our home that could be a used for a gym! So, how about helping me get to the gun show?
Attic Juice Bar Addition
Juicin' in the mornin'! Juicin' in the evenin'! Juicin' all day long! Can you make us a juice bar in our attic? You'd have to add the attic! After it's done, we can juice it up!
Photography Studio Level Addition

Lately I've really gotten into nature and art and seeing the beauty of the world. It's just so grand and awe-inspriring, right? So what I really need is a Photography Studio in my place, and I'd love to get a lot of light into it. The perfect location would be to add a top floor to my home! You can make that happen, right? Just add a floor, no biggie?

So, this "work from home" thing is becoming more normal every day. In order to get in the right mind-space, I need to feel like I'm stepping into a place of work. So, I'm thinking we can add a top floor, make it an office. But also, we'll need an extra bathroom up there. Because for some reason, doing work makes me poop.
Top Floor Office & Bathroom Addition
Family Room
Top Floor Family Room Level Addition

We're fairly satisfied with the current spacing of our home, but we really feel like we could add a family room. So where could we build? We build up! Can you make us a top floor family room? That would just be so swell!
We could really use a new look to our place! But we can't seem to agree on a vision... can you help us decide what we want?
Level Renovation
Commercial
venue
Bar Renovation

We need to juice up our bar! Let's be frank - the clientele has been less than desirable lately. I was hoping to draw in some young hipsters, not hip youngsters! Anything you can do to make our bar juicy for these folks would be tremendously helpful!
Café Renovation

Why does this place just feel so... counterintuitive? I feel like you walk in the door, and walk right into a wall! Okay maybe that's not exactly it, but you know what I mean. The flow is just... off. Can you renovate this level and make it more functional?
Club Renovation
We're in desperate need of a Level Renovation! We haven't seen any apple flavored jeans or fur boots in furever! Please bring the funk back to our club!
Gym Renovation

Help us spice up our gym! We've got some new-age clientele, who are into organic juices and healthy life-styles. Folks don't just want to get swole anymore, they want to live longer! Help us help them by giving them a space that says "long live you!"
Library Renovation

Can you update our Library by redecorating a level? We want folks to know that we're not those dusty old libraries with old books and old people. We can be hip! We can be cool! Show them how with your vision to re-envision our Library!
Lounge Renovation

It's time to revitalize our lounge and we need professional assistance. It doesn't feel very "loungy" right now, does it? Maybe a change in color, perhaps? Or even the floor, or walls? How about the furniture? Just change SOMETHING, I'm already tired of looking at this place!
Vet Clinic Renovation
My Vet Clinic hasn't been drawing in the cool cats; just those doggone strays! Can you help me spruce up my clinic so the place doesn't get neutered? 12 out of 10 needs more grooming!
I've got the Simoleons, if you've got the vision! I'll pay generously for a level renovation! Because really... I'm just bored with the current layout.

So, our kitchen is just...grossly outdated. We're always ordering out because I can't stand being in that kitchen! We need an update, pronto. I'm not saying my cooking will necessarily taste any better. I'm not even saying I'll actually cook in the kitchen. But at least I'd be happy knowing that it's possible!
Kitchen Level Renovation
Living Room
We can use a new Living Room. Feel free to take as much of the level to renovate as you need! I just need some change in my life!
Living Room Level Renovation
Living Room & Kitchen Renovation

This place is pretty old and built with old design aesthetics. We think our living room and kitchen could probably be opened up, and allow more natural light into the area. That support beam? Don't worry about it. This house is supported by the trust I have in you!
GOLDEN BOOKMARK WINNER

Another Golden Bookmark has been found in the stacks of a local library! As always, this round’s lucky bookworm is eager to get started on their all-expenses-paid home renovation.\n\nThe Golden Bookmark is a global program to encourage reading. In other words, this gig is great exposure... and it still pays!
Simucation Council Commission

We of the Simucation Council wish to commission a private installation of artistic excellence for one of our lucky art-lovers. Fill their abode with art!\n\nSupport art and the Simucation Council will support you with exposure and Simoleons.
We feel like our place could use a new room... we can afford the space, if you can provide the vision! Just ask us what we're looking for, okay?
room
Arcade Addition

We're trying to get some younger, techy folks into this place of business. We could really use your help to update our venue with some modern PC's and other gaming hardware. These nerds have deep pockets, so let's get them in here!
Bathroom Addition

With a heavier flow (of foot track) lately we could really use another bathroom! But I really do like the existing space, so try as much as possible to just add to our home, rather than modifying too many walls and floors, cool?

I'm thinking with all the space in my place, I could use an extra room to hang out or put stuff in. I'll be honest, I don't really have a goal for this room. But use your creative freedom to make this space interesting. I've got the money to spend, because that's just how I roll! So make me something cool!
Pick a Room Addition

You know how your in-laws come, and you can't really stand them, and wish they wouldn't step one foot in the house? Maybe we can have it both ways? Please build us an In Law unit. That way, they can stay in their space, without soiling the sanctity of our home!
In Law Unit Addition
nursery
We would LOVE a nursery in our home! Please add a room for us. We aren't necessarily expecting at the moment, but we just like want to be ready for anything!
Nursery Addition
Gym
Home Gym Addition

Pumpin' iron.
Gettin' swole.
The gun show.
A Gym.
In my home.
Make it happen!
Gardening Room
Gardening Room Addition

I am nature's arm. Her Spirit. Heck, I AM mother nature! Come join me, my garden needs tending. But please, we can only do it in my own, personal gardening room. At the end of the day, nature always wins!
Music Studio
Guitar Music Studio Addition

My Axe deserves her own room, ya dig? She needs to be front and center, and maybe on the side, I can put her to practice. But I won't be worthy until you make me a Music Studio where I can bring my heavenly guitar skills to life!
Hobby Room
Hobby Room Addition

Look, I got an A in woodshop, and never looked back. So now that I'm a home-owner, I could really use a space to dedicate my craft in handiness. I could really use a hobby room where I can put all my different handy skills to the test!
Bar
Home Bar Addition

Some times, at the end of a hard day, you just want to get your drink on, know what I mean? Or perhaps, a little something to kick start the morning. Maybe a nightcap? Everything goes with brunch, right? Whatever the case may be, a new home bar would really help. Can you make it happen?
Art Studio
Art Studio Addition

Some would say, I'm kind of an artiste! But who can create from the mind's eye in these conditions? I need a new Art Studio. Just make a new room where I can paint to my heart's desire, with inspiration!
Photo Studio
Photography Studio Addition
Taking the perfect picture is definitely a craft, but it also needs the right conditions. Can you build me a Photo Studio? Something good for lighting and staging things.

The art of playing the piano takes finesse. And the only way to fine-tune one's finesse is to practice with the proper acoustics and inspiration. Will you kindly make me a Piano Room? The symphony must start somewhere!
Piano Music Studio Addition
Tech Room
Tech Room Addition

My buddies and I need to FOCUS our MAD HAXORS Skills till the early AM. But we can't wake my folks, yo! We NEED our own SPACE, and it NEEDS to be LIT. Something to get our PROGRAMMING skillz LIT. And keep the lights LOW, ya hear?
Game Room
Game Room Addition

We're all about the gaming life! I can play with friends and I can play with myself! But gaming requires specificity - and I can only get that in a dedicated gaming room! Once I get that, let the games begin!
closet

Need to add a Walk In Closet to my beautiful bedroom so I have room for all my new shoes and clothes to show off to guests! You used to hide things in your closet, but think of this one as a fancy display case for all the things I wear!
Walk In Closet Addition

We suddenly came into a few Simoleons and thought, what the hey - let's change things up! Can you renovate a room for us? Just a change of pace? Give us a holler and we can tell you some things we like or don't like.
bathroom

Love to get our Bath Room renovated to be more spacious. Right now, it feels like I can take a poop and wash my hands without even standing up. Okay that doesn't sound like a bad thing, but it is! I feel like I can't breathe, and not just because of the poop! Help open up this bathroom for me!
Bathroom Renovation
bedroom

This bedroom... it's starting to have that smell. You know the smell. We just don't talk about the smell. It could really use a fresh coat of paint. Can you help us get rid of this smell with a new scent?
Bedroom Renovation
Remember me? I heard you do good work, so I’ll let you decide which room needs the most help!
Returning Client: Room Renovation
Just pick a room and go for it. This is your chance to make up for last time. Don't make me regret it!
The room to renovate is up to the expert. That's you! We're looking forward to working with you again.
Referral: Room Renovation
Looking for a Living Room. I feel like I could spread out, you know? Sit comfortably, watch some TV. Feel free to make use of the space, Simoleons is no object!
Fabulous Living Room Renovation
Kid's Room

Kids these days... they're all over the place, right? Just, from one thing to the next...maybe ten things in the span of twenty minutes! What the kids need is their OWN space; at least keep them confined. I'm not saying make us a prison, but... if you can put a lock on it, I'm not complaining! A kids room, please!
Kid's Room Renovation
kitchen
This kitchen is SO late eighties. Or is it early ninties? I can't tell, it just feels old to me. Let's get cookin' and spice things up with a kitchen renovation! Can you update it?
Kitchen Renovation
office
My office (if you can call it that) just isn't working out for me. I can't focus! Help redesign my place so it has an actual, functioning office.
Office Renovation

We all know how it feels to wake up after a long night out... It’s not always great, which is why neighborhood bars started the semi-regular renovation raffle! Winners get to wake up (or sleep the juice off) in a brand new, beautiful bedroom!\n\nBars are a key part of the social scene wherever they are. Do this job and we’ll make sure you get the community recognition you deserve!
Palatial Pass-Out Pad Raffle Winner

The Local Gym Alliance is looking to sponsor a bathroom reno for a valued member, because sometimes a quick wash in the communal showers just isn’t enough!\n\nThe Alliance anticipates this job notably improving locker room smells and water bills. For your service, the Alliance is ready to get your name out there! Also, pay. The Alliance will pay you too.
PUMP! UP! THAT! BATHROOM!
OH EM GEE SHOES! I need a walk in closet to display some sweet clothes and sway shoes! Help a Sim with a functional and visually appealing home for things I wear?
Walk In Closet Renovation
Room Addition
Room Renovation
Interior Color Consultant
Median Gig Pay: §600

{0.SimFirstName}'s dream of taking someone's building and reimagining it in fun ways is starting to take shape. Every new home {0.SimFirstName} enters is like a blank canvas, ready to be filled with new and interesting décor styles.

Find a gig to start renovating!

Next Promotion: Interior Design Technician
Median Gig Pay: §900
Certified Interior Designer

Being certified has its benefits, like no boss except the Client, no laws but the zoning laws and no rules but the rule of the Decorator. {0.SimFirstName}'s gig opportunities are as abundant as ever, and the pay ain't so bad as well!
Median Gig Pay: §600
Interior Design Technician

Crazy Colors, Wacky ideas, Clients have some strange requests, Good thing {0.SimFirstName} will take those requests and turn them into a reality. Although {0.SimFirstName}'s career is still early, there's a lot of potential for creativity with new Clients.\n\nNext Level Promotion: Space Manager
Median Gig Pay: §600
Space Manager

{0.SimFirstName} is moving up in the world, so much that new opportunities are presenting themselves! {0.SimFirstName} can now accept gigs for Level Renovations.\n\nNext Level Promotion: Decorating consultant
Median Gig Pay: §600
Decorating Consultant

With this promotion comes an increase in Simoleons, and a little more respect in the world. Clients will listen to {0.SimFirstName}'s ideas and not scoff, for a change!\n\nNext Level Promotion: Building Space Planner

There once was an urban princess who wished to wed a very wealthy urban prince. However, the prince's mother - the queen - was very possessive of him and told the prince he could only marry someone of a refined delicate nature. She came up with a plan to give the princess an impossible test so she could fail her and then go back to spending way too much time coddling her adult son.\nThe queen planned to put a pea under the most cushiony mattress in the family estate, but realized since she never cooked for herself and had no idea where the peas were. Instead she resorted to using a whole pineapple left over from her latest home-spa facial treatment. Much to her disappointment, the Princess felt the pineapple under the mattress and could not sleep, passing the test. The prince and princess were wed and everyone enjoyed some nice pineapple juice. The moral of the story is if you love something, let it go. Also, always know where the peas are. You never know when you'll need to try to trick a princess or make a risotto.
The Princess and the Pineapple Bed

One of the first things they teach you in fancy art schools is the concept of negative space and how it impacts design. Negative space: it's a positive! This bed was designed with that concept in mind. Notice the subtle yet lovely shapes created by the adjoining rectangles at the foot and head of the bed. Yes, in order to fully comprehend the beauty of certain furniture you really do have to learn to see the space that the designer chose not to use. Alright, your art school education is complete so that'll be 200,000 please. Wait, 200,000, really?! Yeesh. Talk about being put in a negative space.
The Beauty of Negative Space Bed
This may be a Kid's bed, but it is not child's play. Kids will be cradled in comfort while sleeping without sacrificing their growing sense of style.
Naturally Nestled Single Bed

This comfortable, simple yet elegant bed, offers a night (or day) of comfort without sacrificing space or your Lot's looks. Its stylish quilted headboard is the perfect balance to this wooden crafted bed. Sleep soundly in serenity.
Serene Repose Single Bed

Just because you're single doesn't mean you have to have a sad single bed. Embrace your ability to sleep without worrying about being woken up by the person sleeping next to you, or worrying about accidentally punching them in the face after an unconcious struggle to maintain control of the blanket majority. That's right - you get the whole bed to yourself, so make it a nice one!
Swingin' Single Bed
Stylish and trendy, this bed is a great option for space saving while looking quite smart. The knobs give it a nice decorative touch without disrupting the flow of its construction.
Single Bed With Knobs

Get the best night of sleep in your life with this ultra comfortable bed. Using only the finest responsibly sourced wood and the softest bamboo sheets, you can rest assured that you are sleeping while saving the planet!
Smooth Single Sumbler

A Lamp that looks like it's wearing a bonnet? So cute! This was the same thought the designers at GeoWerx had when they created the Bonnet Bonnet Lamp after the success of the Lighting set by the same name. Fabulous, cute, and functional just like we love our lighting.
Bonnie Bonnet Lamp by GeoWerx

The designers at Seymore Lighting not only decided to make a Lamp Trio inspired by cupcake wrappers, but also decided to add to the collection a single lamp version for those rooms that need a focal piece all on its own. After all, all those origami lessons and papercuts had to be worth it!
Cupcake Lamp by Seymore Lighting

What's better than good lighting? According to GeoWerx focus group testing, the answer is good lighting that looks like it's wearing cute little bonnets. Yes, our of everyone surveyed, this was the most popular answer, though there were some close runner ups including scented lighting, edible lighting, and lighting that compliments how you look every time you step into a room.
Bonnie Bonnet Lighting by GeoWerx

One night in the Seymore Lighting design studios, our designers were running out of ideas. Staring at the blank whiteboards and the naked lightbulbs, their task to design the new fall season's most innovative lighting was proving to me more daunting than they ever imagined. In need of a sugar rush, they dove into a box of cupcakes when the idea hit them... lampshades inspired by cupcake wrappers! Eureka! After several origami classes and papercuts, this classy, crinkly shade was born. Sometimes grasping at crumbs can be a good thing, especially cupcake crumbs!
Cupcake Lamp Trio by Seymore Lighting

Eventually after developing a million different kinds of lamps, our lighting designers got frustrated and threw this one against the wall. Fortunately, the resulting wonkiness really worked aesthetically and it makes a great conversation starter. Ah, anger makes such great art.
All the Rage Lamp

This perfect little cube-on-a-stand light will add a touch of brightness to your day, and who doesn't need a little extra brightness? We first offered this cube light back in the 90s. At the time, it had a dial-up-modem and a fax machine attached. We've since removed both features and invested more time and energy into improving its lighting capability and aesthetics. We know some people might miss the dial-up-modem, but you can always make modem sounds on your own at home if you're feeling nostalgic. If you're too young to know what a dial up modem is, search for videos online and enjoy the soothing sounds.
Cube 2.0 Light by Seymore Lighting

Presenting a completely unique lighting shape - the spherocylinder! Not quite a sphere, and not quite a cylinder. It's your favorite two shapes smooshed together to create one single super shape, and a super lighting solution. Patent pending. Patents take a while though so please don't steal our idea in the meantime.
Spherocylinder Lighting Capsule by Seymore Lighting

Years ago, a struggling rug shop realized they had no choice but to go out of business. Heartbroken, they put up a "going out of business" sign in the window advertising that everything must go. They suddenly found themselves overrrun with the most customers they had ever seen. It was too bad they had advertised they were going out of business and would soon have to close. Or would they? The owner had the idea to leave the "going out of business" sale in the window for just a few more weeks to see if customers would still show up. It worked, so the owner decided to leave it up for just another month longer, and then just another year longer... and that was now seven years ago. To this day, customers still flock into the perpetually closing store to make bids on fine rugs such as this one. Support small businesses by buying large area rugs!
"Everything Must Go!" Area Rug

A sculpture of a jack from the noble game of jacks. Many people are led to believe that the game of Jacks AKA "Knucklebones" is steeped in a rich history dating all the way back to the ancient Greeks, but what they don't know is that it was actually invented by a lumberjack named Big Jacks McGee who would carve jacks out of wood and hurl them at anyone in his town who offended him. Since he was easily offended, people started amassing bunches of these tiny little star-shaped doohickies and decided to start playing with them. True story! Ask any scholar. Just don't ask the internet because that's not a credible source of information.
Big Jack

No walk-in closet is complete without a hearty collection of classic pumps. Proudly line your walls and shelves with these soothing slip-ons. Edge to edge. Corner to corner. There's no such thing as too many shoes.
Classic Pumps
Perfect for any occasion, it's always handy to have a few pairs of Casual Kicks on hand. For your feet.
Casual Kicks
Always understated, always in style. I dare you to find someone who doesn't live for their favorite pair of sneakers. And if and when you do find them, ask them if their feet are sore.
Don't Forget the Sneaks!
Whether it's date night, brunch with besties, or just a day out on the town, always be prepared with a small stash of Flirty Footwear.
Flirty Footwear

Need more than one fancy box? We've got you boo! These luxurious boxes will hold anything, not reveal anything, and looking good doing so. The more of them the merrier, they even look good stacked neatly with each other.

Lana the Llama spent her childhood wishing she was a moose, but has since embraced her llama-ness and is eager to show you just how much of a llama she can be. Nestle her onto your favorite surface and prepare to be dazzled by her doing what she does best: sitting around being a llama sculpture!

Don't merely call this a Collage... as if! This board is more than random pieces of things put together in a relatively organized way, no sir, no way, no how! This is a inspiration piece, a carefully crafted collection of things that make you go about your day, discuss goals, where and what you want to be. So take a good look, be inspired! Be bold!

A statement piece by master whittling artist and woodworker, Jack Whittler. This particular wooden mosaic is an abstract portrait of his mother, and depicts their uneven, often splintery relationship. A great conversation starter for when you'd like to direct discussion topics toward the complexity of family dynamics or the art of whittling.
Whittler's Mother

This slim, tall, handsome piece of flexible furniture is imploring you, "[Playername], please, attach me to a TV stand, smash me into a desk, make me feel whole again. You know how it is." A true inspiration for any walk-in closet, this floating wall unit is a stunning way for you to display your shoes, hold your knick-knacks and make a statement.\n\nThis floating shelf can be attached to any other wall-placed shelving in the Be Modular line.

For our more introverted clients who lead the private lives, we understand the need to lock precious positions away from prying eyes. Who says being organized can't also mean being stylish? This fine, simple piece combines nicely with other wall shelves and it's subdued visuals are perfect for displaying your most prized posessions.

There's nothing more satisfying than taking small objects and containing them within other objects. NOTHING! This little rectangle shelf with its cute little glass cube on the end has got you covered.\n\nThis wall shelf can be attached to any other wall-placed shelving in the Be Modular line.

This single-door rounded wall shelf is the perfect partner to the rest of the rounded wall pieces from the Be Modular line. Stack ‘em, pile ‘em, put ‘em right next to each other! No matter what you do, you will have furniture to match.

The sky is the limits when it comes to decorating options offered by these unassuming, yet spectacular little cubbies. Most companies encourage their designers to "think outside the box," resulting in thousands of designs being tossed aside just for being boxy. Here at BoxWorks, we believe in thinking inside the box, so much so that our newest line of sinks is entirely box-forward. Why mess with the classics? This perfectly cubed box sink is here to stay!
Boxed Sink by BoxWorks

What's better than a stack of pancakes? A stacked pedestal sink! And while you probably shouldn't be pouring syrup over it, it can definitely help you wash syrup off your hands in the most stylish way. A must have for messy brunch guests!
Super Stacked Sink

Often times humanity wonders what life will be like in the distant future. What kind of new technology will change our lives? More importantly, what kinds of furniture will we sit on? This quilted bar stool is the product of such a wonder. Made of space-age material used aboard several crafts, this chair brings the comfort of tomorrow to your bottom... today!
Tomorrow's Bar Stool

Humanity wonders what life would be like tomorrow... but today. What will things look like? How they will work? Will they work? We sure hope so!\n\nIn the future you can always count on eating, and where there is eating... there is seating. This dining chair is sleek, modern, minimal sure, but it holds enough comfort to get through the rituals of dinners everywhere from the past, present, and future.
The TrendSitter

For anyone with back problems, this plush-yet-firm chair cradles your back but still manages to be firm. Kind of like one of those kindergarten teachers who is really sweet to you but still won't let you make faces at Kelly Schwartz even though she was totally out of line for taking the last graham cracker during snack time.
Plush-yet-Firm Chair
A plush, no-nonsense chair made of space-age futuristic foam. Cradles your backside so well, you'll wish the future would have gotten here years ago.
No-Nonsense Butt-Hugger Chair

Why just accessorize with accessories? If you're going to spend time planning and agonizing over an outfit, you should make sure your surrounding furniture compliments it as well. This unfussy ottoman gives anyone's outfit a nice boost. With its sleek lines and simple silhouette, it's sure to look fabulous in the background of any Simstagram selfie.
Goes-With-Anything Ottoman

It took our furniture engineering team years to figure out how to design the perfect blend of style and comfort, but they did it. Years of staying late in the furniture lab, missing family dinners, birthdays, graduations, anniversaries, weddings, and PTA meetings. But putting their relationships, social lives and wellbeing at risk was worth it for the comfort of your backside. Once you sink into this cushioned masterpiece, you'll agree.
Masterpiece Chair

This ultra swanky chair was made fun of by all other chairs for a long time due to its extra large back, which, in the chair world is the equivalent to having an extra large forehead. The chair was teased relentlessly, excluded from many sleepovers in elementary school, and forced to eat alone at lunch on the playground. Then one day a furniture scout spotted the chair and the rest is history. Suddenly the chair was featured in catalogues and showrooms all over the world. Bidding wars ensued about which shop was going to sell the chair, and auctioneers ran out of breath taking offers from multiple designers. The chair is now available to the public, to those who respect its unique look, of course. The moral of the story is beauty is in the eye of the beholder, but also, don't be a jerk to someone just because they look different than you.
Rags to Riches Chair

Enjoy this stylish chaise's options of armless, double-armed, left armed, right armed, or even nestled into your sectional sofa. No living space is complete without the tender touch of the Tough and Tufted Chaise Lounge.
Tough and Tufted Chaise Lounge
Stretch out your weary legs at the end of the day on this masterful chaise that looks just as fine at the end of your sofa as it does on its own.
A Lounge Evolved: The Sectional Chaise

Yet another piece of furniture without arms? Have we lost our minds? Nope, we're just embracing minimalism. You should try it! This sleek bench is great for anyone who has visitors they want to impress, but not the kind of visitors they want getting too comfortable in their living room.
Superficially Social Sitting Bench

This may not look like the traditional loveseat since it's got no arms, but neither does the Venus de Milo and she's doing quite well for herself. So, cuddle up to that special Sim-one and enjoy! You may not be able to rest your arms anywhere, but you'll find things to do with them.
Special Sim-One Loveseat

The sky is the limit when it comes to configuration options for the Tough and Tufted. Dare to leverage the full suite of seating shapes this stylish sectional has to offer and you surely won't regret it.
Tough and Tufted Sectional Sofa
More than a loveseat, more than a sofa. A Couch Evolved Sectional can be twisted, turned, capped, cornered, and extended to suit any home's comfort needs.
A Couch Evolved: The Sectional Sofa

According to the largest community for interior decorating, Residence Remedy, this large swoopy-back couch is all the rage to become the hottest trend. It's got it all. Squishy, butt-supporting cushions, carefully placed pillows and of course, that elegant swoop-back. Swoop swoop!
Swoopy Backed Sofa

If fire isn't your thing or if you would like to benefit from safe and renewable power sources, look no further than the Induct'o'Matic! This stylish induction stove will cook any meal you throw at it with only low chances of burning down the house.
Induct'o'Matic

It has been said that the key to some cuisines is firepower. We're not big on ancient philosophy but here at Blazin' Ladles we believe in a good, steady flame to warm your heart and your stomach. Whether you're just sauteeing some veggies or stir-frying up a gourmet storm - look no further than this modern take on an old classic.
Modern Gas Stove By Blazin' Ladles

And sailed it home

That is amazing to care for
For my tchotchkes and trinkets

"It looks like a Boat" Coffee Table

Perfectly sided surface for all your knick knacks and things you don't want your visitors to touch! Equitative sides to make things even so none of your items fight for their space, it all fits! This is quite the magnificent square.
It's Good To Be Square - Coffee Table
The perfect partner to a sectional sofa, The Acute Coffee Table by Be Modular can be snapped into any configuration to match whatever wild shape your sectional takes.
The Acute Coffee Table by Be Modular

As a rather social coffee table, this little sweetie loves to be paired up with other Be Modular furnishings like desks, floor shelves, or even other coffee tables! Go ahead, find creative ways to make this little lovie happy.
The Rounded Coffee Table by Be Modular

A six legged table?! Unconventional? Yes, but sturdy? Definitely! I mean it works for ants and an ant can lift 5,000 times its own body weight. We're not saying you should start stacking 5,000 of these tables on top of this table, but if you're looking for a place to put that rock solid fruitcake, this will do.
Rock Steady Six-Legged Table

Centuries ago after the great table wars, society found themselves with a shortage of tables since so many were lost in battle. A local fisherman who had only built boats before volunteered to craft one for his seaside village, but as he had no experience building tables, he wasn't quite sure how to attach individual table legs. Instead, he constructed the supports the same way he would have built a boat rudder. Thankfully it worked, and people were once again able to eat dinner on a table rather than a plank of wood they stretched across their laps. Whew!
Tabley McTableface the Table

Centuries ago during the great table wars, Cuthbert B. Table the 4th led all circular end tables to victory against the square end tables. The road was long and some tables came out looking quite shabby on the other side - lack of varnish, missing legs, chipped surfaces and water stains from lack of coaster usage, but it was all worth it. As a tribute to his legacy, please use this replica of Cuthbert B. Table with pride. They don't teach this sort of thing in schools or the internet, but now you know the true history.
Cuthbert B. Table

Calling all enjoyers of muffins, scones, and flakey croissants! Presenting: the Crumbcatcher. With built-in crumb-catching technology, this little end table is perfect for those times when you've just eaten a large platter of granola bars, got up off the couch, reached for the remote only to have a cascade of crumbs follow you in your wake. Instead of hitting the floor, this little table collects them for you, making cleanup easy. It only works on two sides though, so... take note and plan your crumb dusting accordingly. Maybe some day science can figure out how to make it work on all sides of the table, but we're just not there yet.
The Crumbcatcher End Table

This precious piece is as perfect at the end of your sofa as it is nestled next to you in bed. The Simply Squared End Table by Be Modular

This delightfully emotive coffee table embodies the wonderment we feel at Be Modular when we see our modular furnishings pushed to their glorious organizational extremes.

Awestruck Erik can be attached to other floor-placed items in the Be Modular line.

We're confident you'll properly shock him.
Awestruck Erik by Be Modular

The designer of this table couldn't decide whether or not to make the table a classic square shape or a softer, more modern circular shape. In the end, indecisiveness won so we present to you the Squircle table. It's a square, but with rounded edges! We think it's quite catchy. Squircles will be everywhere this spring so jump on the bandwagon while you can!
The Squircle Hallway Table
This tent will not protect your children from the dangers of the wild, but it will unlock the wilds of their imagination!

Getting to know the Client can make the difference between a decent renovation and a great one. Sims can have many different Likes and Dislikes, but they’ll focus on a few preferences for a gig. More experienced Interior Decorators can learn preferences quickly and suggest different colors or décor. If you’re not feeling chatty, you can send the Client away and get right to work.

Each successful gig brings you closer to the top! Gain experience to access a wider variety of gigs. Interior Decorators not only need to manage their Career Performance (just like other Careers), but also their Professional Reputation. Professional Reputation can open the door to even more opportunities, whether that’s a second chance from a disgruntled Client or attention from the Dream Home Decorator Network.

Enter Build Mode to start making renovations. The Gig Information Panel displays the Client’s budget, preferences, and any requirements or restrictions. You can click on discovered preferences to quickly see relevant objects.

Once you’re happy with the renovations, it’s time to call the Client back. You’ll be prompted to select the photos you want to showcase and decide how to handle the Reveal. You can either host the Reveal personally or leave it to the Client to check out on their own time.

You’ll need to document the renovation process by taking Before and After Photos. You can take photos from your phone, camera, or by clicking on the ground where you want to take the shot. Check out the Taking The Perfect Decorator Picture Lesson to learn more.

When it's time to start a gig, you’ll be prompted to make a choice. You can either send Sims off by themselves or you can go with them. If you choose to go with them, you will travel to meet the Client at the lot in need of renovation. Once there, you can direct your Sim through the renovation process by following the Gig Tasks in the Career Panel.

Some gigs require you to add an entire room or level. With these gigs, you can only add objects to the added tiles. For renovation gigs, you can add objects anywhere, but can't move the existing walls or floors.

Tired of your neighbors' terrible décor? Wish you could share your impeccable taste with the world? Then it’s time to join the Interior Decorator Career! Interior Decorators bring their Client’s renovation dreams to life one gig at a time. Once you join the Career, use the Career Panel to Look for Gigs.

Hosting the Reveal lets you show off the new space and see how the Client really feels. After looking around, Clients will be ready to share their Final Verdict. Everyone wants to be heard, and even an upset Client will appreciate the effort.
Interior Decorator Career

The first item placed is the “parent” of the object chain. Every subsequent piece of shelving or furniture that you place is a “child” of that parent object.\n\nDetach single pieces of furnishings or entire groups by trailing down the chain to see the portion of the family you’re detaching based on what’s highlighted.

You will see an almost magnetic attachment the Modular Shelving pieces have to each other as you place them next to each other. Listen for a subtle little audio cue to confirm when items have been successfully slotted or un-slotted.\n\nMove the entire group by clicking and dragging the parent object. Whatever piece in the family you hover over, the parent will always have a gentle pulse highlight to keep you grounded.

Modular Shelving is a collection of curated furniture pieces that can be snapped together to customize and create more unique and creative storage options than ever before.\n\nTo narrow down the specific set of items that can mix and match with each other, simply type the key word “Modular” into the Build catalog’s Search field and hit Enter.

The Sims 4 team at large encourages you to please make the most extravagant entertainment centers you can imagine, plaster your soulmate’s name on your living room walls with small cubbies, and in general please just have fun with Modular Shelving.

There you will find a classy and sassy array of not just wall shelving, but also a small set of floor-placed furniture that are compatible snapping partners.

Floor-placed furniture can only attach to other floor-placed furniture options and wall-placed furniture can only attach to other wall-placed furniture items.

This functionality is not just limited to shelving, but also includes some specific TV Stands, Dressers, Bookshelves, End Tables, and Coffee Tables. And don’t forget the Wall-Hanging clothing shelves for the most extravagant walk-in closets!
Modular Shelving

While taking pictures:

Use the W, A, S and D keys to move forward, left, backward, and right.
Use the Q and E keys to move the camera up and down.
Use the Scroll Wheel to zoom in and out.
Left Click to switch control between moving the mouse and the camera.

The photos you take will be in your Sim’s Inventory just like when you take a normal photo. These are your photos to do whatever you want with. The Memory Card in your Sim’s Inventory saves the photos for the Client. You can view and manage the Client copies from the Memory Card or a computer. If you ever lose the Memory Card, a new one will be given to your Sim at the start of a gig.

Sims can take Before and After Photos from the phone or a camera. You can also click on the ground where you want to take the picture. Once you’re looking through the viewfinder, it’s time to get that perfect shot.

During an Interior Decorator Career Gig, Sims can take photos to document the space before and after renovations. Whether it’s due to a slight fisheye or trade secrets, taking photos is a little different when your Sim is on the job.
